name: typebeat
description: Sampler, synth, and sequencer designed for the QWERTY keyboard.

scripts.init: npm install && (test cargo-watch || cargo install cargo-watch)
scripts.start: mkdir -p target/debug/samples; cp assets/samples/* target/debug/samples; (vite ui --clearScreen false &); cargo watch --watch src --watch build.rs --exec run; pkill node
